page.title: 02SHOPS IN NAIRN
page.content: Most of the shops in{Nairn}are centred around the{High Street,King {Street,Leopold Street & Cawdor Road. { }The {High Street}has the greatest amount of shops.Of the{ninety_three shops we counted,seventeen sold types of{food,}eleven sold{clothes,} and because Nairn has tourists in the summer season seven shops catered for this type of customer. The remainder of the shops sold articles ranging from toys to videos. What we noticed was that eleven of the shops were empty.Recently two grocers,a ladies clothes shop,a jewellers,a dairy,a shoe shop,a coal office,and a greengrocers has closed. We wondered if the opening of a { {Templetons Supermarket}in {King Street and a new enclosed shopping precinct in Inverness has affected Nairn trade.
